name: appc.sqlite3
description: An Arrow connector for the popular filebased SQL database

scripts.all: npm i --no-optional && npm run clean && npm run lint:fix && npm run test && npm run build:dist && npm run security && npm run check:dependencies
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:dev && npm run check:dependencies && npm run security
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:lint && npm run test && npm run build:dist
scripts.release:publish: git add -A && git push origin HEAD:master && git push origin HEAD:master --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release:publish && git push origin HEAD:master --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release:publish && git push origin HEAD:master --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release:publish && git push origin HEAD:master --follow-tags
scripts.release:prerelease: npm version prerelease && npm run release:publish && git push origin HEAD:master --follow-tags
scripts.release:npm: curl -X GET http://registry.ecd.axway.int:8081/artifactory/local-npm/$npm_package_name/-/$npm_package_name-$npm_package_version.tgz 2>/dev/null > $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version.tgz && npm publish --registry  https://registry.npmjs.org ./$npm_package_name-$npm_package_version.tgz && rm ./$npm_package_name-$npm_package_version.tgz
scripts.security: retire --exitwith 0 --package --outputformat json --outputpath scan-retire.json && npm audit --registry https://registry.npmjs.org --json > scan-audit.json || true
